articles.title: NH man pleads guilty to unlawfully delivering firearm to car theft suspect
articles.description:
The New Hampshire man purchased a semi-automatic pistol for a co-conspirator who was ineligible for a gun license.

The post NH man pleads guilty to unlawfully delivering firearm to car theft suspect appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Former state Sen. Dean Tran pleads guilty to obstruction of justice, making false statements
